channel.title: Handling objects from one big class and other smaller classes
channel.description: So I just wonder how it would be possible to have this one big object class (where it defines what each ID does) and import objects to that class from smaller classes like CastleWars class, where only castlewars object ids would be handled?

item.title: Handling objects from one big class and other smaller classes
item.dc:creator: @zeropointx zeropointx

@zeropointx wrote:

So I just wonder how it would be possible to have this one big object class (where it defines what each ID does) and import objects to that class from smaller classes like CastleWars class, where only castlewars object ids would be handled?
